title: Application should catch problems with Github authentication
body_html: if something bad happens on the GH-side (likely because the user didn't authorize the app) and Omniauth redirects back to our app, it (or Devise?) tries to redirect to new_session_path. We don't have that since we don't know how to login users other than through GH auth. Instead of a meaningful error ("We couldn't log you in, fix Github!" or something), the user gets a 500 Internal Server Error.
